abstract: Plastic Logic of Britain is in discussions with Russia’s state-controlled Rusnano, a nanotechnology corporation, to provide a capital infusion that would give it ownership of the company. According to The Financial Times, the move is “likely to fuel fears about ownership of potentially world-beating U.K. technology being transferred to other countries.”
snippet: Plastic Logic of Britain is in discussions with Russia’s state-controlled Rusnano, a nanotechnology corporation, to provide a capital infusion that would give it ownership of the company. According to The Financial Times, the move is “likely to fu...
lead_paragraph: Plastic Logic of Britain is in discussions with Russia’s state-controlled Rusnano, a nanotechnology corporation, to sell a stake to the Russian firm. According to The Financial Times, the move is “likely to fuel fears about ownership of potentially world-beating U.K. technology being transferred to other countries.”

headline.main: Deal for Plastic Logic Could Fan British Fears
